mapper.insert: insert into mkt_campaign_rel (MKT_CAMPAIGN_REL_ID, REL_TYPE, A_MKT_CAMPAIGN_ID, Z_MKT_CAMPAIGN_ID, EFF_DATE, EXP_DATE, APPLY_REGION_ID, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK) values (#{mktCampaignRelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{relType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{aMktCampaignId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{zMktCampaignId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{effDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{expDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{applyRegionId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{statusDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update mkt_campaign_rel set REL_TYPE = #{relType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, A_MKT_CAMPAIGN_ID = #{aMktCampaignId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, Z_MKT_CAMPAIGN_ID = #{zMktCampaignId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, EFF_DATE = #{effDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, EXP_DATE = #{expDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, APPLY_REGION_ID = #{applyRegionId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, STATUS_CD = #{statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_STAFF = #{createStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, UPDATE_STAFF = #{updateStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, STATUS_DATE = #{statusDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where MKT_CAMPAIGN_REL_ID = #{mktCampaignRelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select MKT_CAMPAIGN_REL_ID, REL_TYPE, A_MKT_CAMPAIGN_ID, Z_MKT_CAMPAIGN_ID, EFF_DATE, EXP_DATE, APPLY_REGION_ID, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK from mkt_campaign_rel where MKT_CAMPAIGN_REL_ID = #{mktCampaignRelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select MKT_CAMPAIGN_REL_ID, REL_TYPE, A_MKT_CAMPAIGN_ID, Z_MKT_CAMPAIGN_ID, EFF_DATE, EXP_DATE, APPLY_REGION_ID, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK from mkt_campaign_rel
